subject: Fix budget calculations, section visibility, and improve UX
body:
Fixed Issues:
- Budget calculator options now update when models change in Client Mode
- Eliminated empty sections after switching modes or calculations
- Charts now display contextual subtitles/descriptions
- Tooltips only appear on complex inputs, reducing clutter

Technical Changes:
- Added updateClientBudgetOptions() call in onModelSelectionChange()
- Created centralized hideAllResultPanels() function
- Removed 50+ lines of redundant panel-hiding code
- Added subtitle property to all major chart configurations
- Made tooltip icons conditional based on hint complexity
- Added variables-summary class for consistent cleanup

Documentation:
- Updated README.md with January 2026 changelog
- Updated claude.md with detailed bug fix documentation
- Updated last modified dates
